description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
number of experiment from publication
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
number of the participant
name of the participant
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
species of individuals participating in the study – chimpanzee/gorilla
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the ape participants - usually numerical
identification number of each image
initial time of the trial – hour minute second
the order blocks were presented to the participants – 1 = first block 1 and second block 2  /  2 = first block 2 and second block 1
description of block order - Block_1-Block_2 / Block_2-Block_1
the block presented to the participant -  training / block 1 / block 2
initialization cross time on the screen
the image that appeared on the left of the screen
the image that appeared on the right of the screen
response time of the participant in milliseconds including buffer time
whether the participant received the reward or not -  0 =  did not received reward  / 1 = received reward
the image that the participant selected – right/ left
